tool_description: This is a sample server Petstore server.  You can find out more about     Swagger at [http://swagger.io](http://swagger.io) or on [irc.freenode.net, #swagger](http://swagger.io/irc/).      For this sample, you can use the api key `special-key` to test the authorization     filters.
name: appyyyyyy
title: appyyyyyy

api_list.name: updatePetWithForm
api_list.description: Updates a pet in the store with form data

required_parameters.name: petId
required_parameters.description: ID of pet that needs to be updated

api_list.name: createUsersWithArrayInput
api_list.description: Creates list of users with given input array
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://appyyyyyy.p.rapidapi.com/user/createWithArray"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "appyyyyyy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: addPet
api_list.description: Add a new pet to the store
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://appyyyyyy.p.rapidapi.com/pet"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "appyyyyyy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
